column34: Please let us know where you heard about us?

column10: This intersection is dangerous every school day when kids are trying to cross N. George Mason Drive in the crosswalk by N. 15th Street.  Cars just don’t stop for pedestrians in the crosswalk!  Between ~ 7:15am and 7:35am, school kids can’t cross safely.

As I was crossing N George Mason Dr heading west on 15th St, the driver in the inner lane of N George Mason headed south stopped for me, but the driver in the outer lane headed south did not stop, even though i was already in the crosswalk
